data.csv.timestamp: The timestamp of a measurement, milliseconds since 1 January 1970.
data.csv.ts_id: The water level time series identification code.
data.csv.measure: The sum of value and a gauge's gauge datum.  The unit of measure of each is metres.

e_testing.csv.timestamp: The timestamp of a measurement, milliseconds since 1 January 1970.
e_testing.csv.ts_id: The water level time series identification code.
e_testing.csv.measure: The sum of value and a gauge's gauge datum.  The unit of measure of each is metres.
e_testing.csv.e_measure: The estimates of - measure - by model.keras

e_training.csv.timestamp: The timestamp of a measurement, milliseconds since 1 January 1970.
e_training.csv.ts_id: The water level time series identification code.
e_training.csv.measure: The sum of value and a gauge's gauge datum.  The unit of measure of each is metres.
e_training.csv.e_measure: The estimates of - measure - by model.keras

history.csv.loss: Per epoch, and in order, mean(square(y_true - y_predicted))
history.csv.root_mean_squared_error: Per epoch, and in order, sqrt(mean(square(y_predicted - y_true)))

model.keras.desc: The recurrent neural network, i.e., long short term memory, model for the gauge point.

modelling.json.desc: Outlines the modelling input variables, output variables, epochs value, and batch size.

scaling.json.desc: Outlines the scaling attributes for the data of a model.

testing.csv.timestamp: The timestamp of a measurement, milliseconds since 1 January 1970.
testing.csv.ts_id: The water level time series identification code.
testing.csv.measure: The sum of value and a gauge's gauge datum.  The unit of measure of each is metres.

training.csv.timestamp: The timestamp of a measurement, milliseconds since 1 January 1970.
training.csv.ts_id: The water level time series identification code.
training.csv.measure: The sum of value and a gauge's gauge datum.  The unit of measure of each is metres.
